mathematica: a[ n_] := If[ n < 1, 0, Sum[ Mod[ d, 2] EulerPhi[ d] 2^(n / d), {d, Divisors[ n]}]] (* _Michael Somos_, May 09 2013 *)
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, sumdiv( n, d, (d % 2) * eulerphi(d) * 2^(n / d)))} /* _Michael Somos_, May 09 2013 */(Haskell)a053636 0 = 0a053636 n = sum $ zipWith (*) (map a000010 ods) (map ((2 ^) . (div n)) ods)            where ods = a182469_row n-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 13 2013
